overview:
Patrick Dietzen brings over a decade of early stage tech venture operational expertise. He serves as VP of Business Development at SaurikIT LLC, which owns and manages Cydia, the top open software store on mobile devices. Patrick has played founder and executive roles in numerous technology ventures.

He founded Sirigen Group Ltd, a molecular diagnostics company selling market leading detection chemistries for biomarker detection, which are based on ultra bright materials and are critical to healthcare diagnostics and life sciences research. He served as the President of LetsCram, a social e-learning web service, and he founded and led an early web development company in Chicago, which provided nearly 30 clients their first websites.
